page.title: 03Young Lady's View of FINTRY
page.content: {Fintry is}probably one of, if not the most attractive village in Scotland although there is not a lot to it. The villagers themselves take pride in it. {During the day}its usually quite quiet except the school holidays when all the children and students alike, are wandering around looking for something to do. Personally I don't think there are enough facilities for the younger generation.{The sports centre is a {great asset which I feel could provide {more.}There is no reason why it should not get together teams for example, hockey, football, shinty, tug of war etc. to challenge other clubs. This would give more people a chance to be involved in something.{The monthly bus service would do better on a Saturday, it would make more money to ensure it was not taken off.{But I'll always {think highly of Fintry. It's unique. }
